content: Available Operating Systems are: Windows 11 Pro, Windows 11 Pro Education, Windows 11 Home - HP recommends Windows 11 Pro for business, Windows 11 Home Single Language - HP recommends Windows 11 Pro for business, Windows 11 Pro (Windows 11 Enterprise or Windows 10 Enterprise available with a Volume Licensing Agreement), and FreeDOS.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

subfeatures.content: Windows 11 Pro (Windows 11 Enterprise or Windows 10 Enterprise available with a Volume Licensing Agreement)

content: Processor family: Intel Core™ Ultra 5 processor or Intel Core™ Ultra 7 processor.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

subfeatures.content: Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 155H (up to 3.8 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.8 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 24 MB L3 cache, 6 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 22 threads)
Intel Core™ Ultra 5 125H (up to 3.6 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.5 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 18 MB L3 cache, 4 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 18 threads)
Intel® Core™ Ultra 7 155U (up to 3.8 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.8 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 12 MB L3 cache, 2 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 14 threads)
Intel Core™ Ultra 5 125U (up to 3.6 GHz E-core Max Turbo frequency, up to 4.3 GHz P-core Max Turbo frequency, 12 MB L3 cache, 2 P-cores and 8 E-cores, 14 threads)

content: Maximum memory is 32 GB DDR5-5600 MT/s RAM. Transfer rates are up to 5600 MT/s, and the system supports dual channel memory. Memory slots: 2 SODIMM.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

content: Internal storage options include PCIe Gen4x4 NVMe™ M.2 SSD or PCIe NVMe™ Value SSD.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

up to 256 GB PCIe NVMe™ Value SSD

content: Display size (diagonal, metric) is 35.6 cm (14"). The aspect ratio is 16:10.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

14" diagonal, WUXGA (1920 x 1200), IPS, anti-glare, 300 nits, 45% NTSC
14" diagonal, WUXGA (1920 x 1200), touch, IPS, anti-glare, 300 nits, 45% NTSC
14" diagonal, WQXGA (2560 x 1600), IPS, anti-glare, 500 nits, 100% DCI-P3

content: The system includes Integrated or Discrete graphics options (Supports DX12 and HDMI 2.1).

subfeatures.content: Discrete: NVIDIA GeForce RTX™ 2050 Laptop GPU (4 GB GDDR6 dedicated)

content: Audio is by Poly Studio, with dual stereo speakers featuring discrete amplifiers, and integrated dual array microphones.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

content: Standard ports include USB Type-C, USB Type-A, HDMI, a combo audio jack, and RJ-45 (HDMI cable sold separately).

2 USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (1 charging, 1 power)

source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

content: The system is compatible with Miracast-certified devices. WWAN is an optional feature.

content: HP Long Life 3-cell, 56 Wh Li-ion polymer battery. The battery is internal and not replaceable by the customer but is serviceable by warranty. It supports fast charging of 50% in 30 minutes.

content: The PC is ENERGY STAR® certified. Compliance certifications include GS Mark, CSA/UL 62368-1, FCC/ICES/CISPR/VCCI, CE Marking, China CCC/SRRC, Taiwan BSMI/NCC, Korea KCC/KC/KES, Ukraine NSOC/TEC, EAEU Compliance, Saudi Arabian Compliance, Low blue light, and WW ROHS.

subfeatures.content: EPEAT Gold registered in the U.S.

content: Sustainable Impact specifications include Low halogen, Bulk packaging, 100% sustainably sourced and recyclable molded paper pulp cushion, 100% sustainably sourced and recyclable outside box and corrugated cushions, 20% post-consumer recycled plastic, Ocean-bound plastic in speaker enclosure and system fan, and 50% recycled metal. The chassis contains 50 percent post-industrial recycled stamped aluminum.
source_model: HP ProBook 440 14 inch G11 Notebook PC

content: 1-year warranty and 90 day software limited warranty options depending on country. Batteries have a default one year limited warranty. On-site service and extended coverage is also available. HP Care Pack Services are optional extended service contracts.
